description: Adds or updates a file in a branch in an CodeCommit repository, and generates a commit for the addition in the specified branch.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository where you want to add or update the file.

parameters.name: branchName
parameters.description: The name of the branch where you want to add or update the file. If this is an empty repository, this branch is created.

parameters.name: fileContent
parameters.description: The content of the file, in binary object format.

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: The name of the file you want to add or update, including the relative path to the file in the repository.

parameters.name: parentCommitId
parameters.description: The full commit ID of the head commit in the branch where you want to add or update the file. If this is an empty repository, no commit ID is required. If this is not an empty repository, a commit ID is required. The commit ID must match the ID of the head commit at the time of the operation. Otherwise, an error occurs, and the file is not added or updated.

nested_items.name: commitId
nested_items.description: The full SHA ID of the commit that contains this file change.

nested_items.name: blobId
nested_items.description: The ID of the blob, which is its SHA-1 pointer.

nested_items.name: treeId
nested_items.description: The full SHA-1 pointer of the tree information for the commit that contains this file change.
